phrase.item: Your feet were bound.
You didn't have patience, you were bound by the long distance.
I wail for you as a nightingale.
I am just talking, but inside I am cut up [as if] with a knife.
‎‎I wail for you as a nightingale.
A sewn sack
Whoever is going to my daughter, tell the daughter her mother is upset.
‎‎I wail for you as a nightingale
A sewn needle box.
I kept staring, but you made me leave thirsty.
‎‎I wail for you as a nightingale.
The river descended.
The swimmers came, I wonder what my dear brother has sent me.
‎‎I wail for you as a nightingale.
Gold is in the steppe.
I make a crook from iron for you, I look for you to come back.
‎‎I wail for you as a nightingale.
Your tasbih [prayer-beads] is black.
I say you are unfaithful, you left me here.
‎‎I wail for you as a nightingale.
The garden dried out.
When I come out for a walk in the garden, you have forgotten your daughter.
‎‎I wail for you as a nightingale.
The irrigation trench is dammed.
I consider you as my descendant, where are you?
‎‎I wail for you as a nightingale.
I make ??? for you, I will tie ??? to your neck.
‎‎I wail for you as a nightingale.
The moon is in your floor.
What I would blame your pain, from your pain [I am] like black coal.
‎‎I wail for you as a nightingale.
[The bird] is in the sky.
At the beginning I didn't know, now my heart and my insides are burning.
‎‎I wail for you as a nightingale.
The sun is shining.
I stayed in the desert, who was aware of my situation?
‎‎I wail for you as a nightingale.
Drops of rain are dropping.
At the beginning I didn't know, now my heart and my insides are burning.
‎‎I wail for you as a nightingale.
Autumn came, a mother grew apart from her daughter.
‎‎I wail for you as a nightingale.
Your ???
Several people came, to get my beloved brother.
‎‎I wail for you as a nightingale.
Your vittles is made at your father's [home].
The day when I die, [only then] I can forget my dear brother.
‎‎I wail for you as a nightingale.
Your eyebrows are like pencil.
I didn't burn just for you, I am burned for your eyes and brows.
‎‎I wail for you as a nightingale.
Your wheat is stook.
Lucky are all those ladies, who are sitting face to face with one another.
‎‎I wail for you as a nightingale.
Your wheat ???
Lucky those children, always after their [mothers].
‎‎I wail for you as a nightingale.
Tiny [milk] sparrow cage.
Don't trap her inside, in this world [people] remember each other.
‎‎I wail for you as a nightingale.
The four books of Hofiz
It's been months and years.
My beloved brother is getting up early tomorrow.
‎‎I wail for you as a nightingale.
A thin young man came, ???
‎‎I wail for you as a nightingale.
Green grass by the river.
I didn't do what my mother told me, now my fate is my mother's punishment.
‎‎I wail for you as a nightingale.
The river ???
The winter passed, summer is coming.
‎‎I wail for you as a nightingale.
In ??? is buttermilk
It is not the bilbilik's [the song's] fault, to be upset with the bilbilik.
‎‎I wail for you as a nightingale.
